LanguageData.MessageRaidersDetectedEarlyAssault: {0} tukikohdasta {1} ovat huomanneet siirtokunnan ja aloittavat hyökkäyksen aikaisessa.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersKidnapping: {0} tukikohdasta {1} ovat päättäneet kidnapata kaikki ketkä he voivat ja lähteä.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersStealing: {0} from {1} have decided to steal what they can and leave.
LanguageData.MessageRaidersSatisfiedLeaving: {0} tukikohdasta {1} ovat tyytyväisiä aiheuttamaansa vahinkoon ja ovat poistumassa.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsTrappedLeaving: {0} from {1} have been trapped and are digging out to escape.
LanguageData.MessageVisitorsDangerousTemperature: {0} from {1} are leaving the map because of dangerous temperature.
LanguageData.MessageNeedBeaconToTradeWithShip: Tarvitset orbitaalisen kaupankäyntimajakan tehdäksesi vaihtokauppaa tämän aluksen kanssa.
LanguageData.MessageOutOfNearbyShellsFor: {0} ei löytänyt lähistöltä varaamattomia ammuksia kohteeseen {1}.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalManhuntsOnTameFailed: Varoitus: {0} saattaa hyökätä epäonnistuneen kesytysyrityksen takia (todennäköisyys {1}).
LanguageData.MessageTameAndNameSuccess: {0} onnistui eläimen {1} kesyttämisessä (todennäköisyys {2}) ja antoi sille nimeksi {3}.
LanguageData.MessageColonyCannotAfford: Yhdyskunnalla ei ole varaaa tähän kauppaan.
LanguageData.MessageColonyNotEnoughSilver: Sinulla ei ole tarpeeksi hopeaa valmiina tätä vaihtoa varten.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestable: Pitää määrittää ruokaa tuottavia, tarpeeksi kasvaneita kasveja.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateHarvestableWood: Pitää määrittää puuta tuottavia, tarpeeksi kasvaneita puita.
LanguageData.MessageNothingCanRemoveThickRoofs: Mikään ei voi poistaa paksuja kattoja.
LanguageData.MessageAlreadyInStorage: Tämä on jo varastossa ja siirretään tarvittaessa korkean prioriteetin varastoon.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateStrippable: Täytyy määrittää ruumis tai maassa oleva henkilö jolla on riisuttavia vaatteita.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateSlaughterable: Täytyy määrittää kesy eläin joka kuuluu yhdyskunnalle.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateOpenable: Täytyy määrittää täysiä hautoja tai säilöjä.
LanguageData.MessageNoMedicalBeds: Lääkisemiseen varattuja sänkyjä ei ole yhtään saatavilla.
LanguageData.MessageNoAnimalBeds: There are no animal beds available.
LanguageData.MessageTooLowMedCare: Operation requires {0} or better, but {1}'s current medical care mode is "{2}".
LanguageData.MessageMedicalOperationFailureRidiculous: {0} has failed in a ridiculous way while operating on {1}.
LanguageData.MessagePawnExitMapRelationsGain: Koska {0} poistui alueelta terveenä, suhteesi ryhmän {1} kanssa ovat parantuneet {2}.
LanguageData.MessageNuzzledPawnGaveNameTo: {0} antoi eläimelle {1} nimeksi {2} kun se kiehnäsi häntä.
LanguageData.MessageNoHandlerSkilledEnough: Mikään eläintenkäsittelijä ei voi kesyttää eläintä {0} (tarvitsee tason {1} taidossa {2}, parhaalla käsittelijällä {3} on {4}).
LanguageData.MessageHiveReproduced: A bug hive has reproduced itself.
LanguageData.MessageTraderCaravanLeaving: The trade caravan from {0} is leaving.
LanguageData.MessageSocialFight: {0} started a social fight with {1}. Reason: {2}.
LanguageData.MessageNewMarriageCeremony: Colonists are gathering to celebrate {0} and {1}’s marriage.
LanguageData.MessageMarriageCeremonyStarts: {0} and {1} are beginning their marriage ceremony!
LanguageData.MessageMarriageCeremonyCalledOff: The marriage ceremony for {0} and {1} has been called off.
LanguageData.MessageNewlyMarried: {0} and {1} have married. Colonists are now celebrating the occasion.
LanguageData.MessageMarriageCeremonyAfterPartyFinishe: The marriage ceremony for {0} and {1} has finished.
LanguageData.MessageNewBondRelationNewName: {0} and {1} have formed a bond. {0} has named {1} {2}.
LanguageData.MessageBondedAnimalMentalBreak: {0} has a mental break because of {1}'s death.
LanguageData.MessageNamedBondedAnimalMentalBreak: {0} named {1} has a mental break because of {2}'s death.
LanguageData.MessageBondedAnimalsMentalBreak: {0} animals have a mental break because of {1}'s death.
LanguageData.MessageShipChunkDrop: A chunk of a spacecraft has fallen from space and landed nearby.
LanguageData.MessagePartyCalledOff: The party has been called off.
LanguageData.MessageCannotSellItemsReason: Some items cannot be traded because of:
LanguageData.MessageConstructionFailed: {1} failed while constructing {0}. Some resources have been wasted.
LanguageData.MessageNoLongerSocialFighting: {0} and {1} are no longer social fighting.
LanguageData.MessageFailedToSendCaravanBecausePawnLos: Failed to send the caravan because one of the colonists, prisoners or animals has been lost.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanFormationPaused: The caravan formation process will continue when everyone recovers from a mental break.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanFormationUnpaused: Your colonists will now continue forming a caravan.
LanguageData.MessageCaravanMemberHasExtremeMentalBrea: One of the caravan members has a mental break.
LanguageData.MessageMaxPlanetCoveragePerformanceWarni: Varoitus: Koko planeetan luominen voi kestää erittäin kauan.
LanguageData.MessagePlantDiedOfRot: {0} has died from rotting due to being left unharvested.
LanguageData.MessagePawnBeingBurned: {0} is being burned by superheated air!
LanguageData.MessagePawnLeftMapAndCreatedCaravan: {0} has left the area and formed a caravan.
LanguageData.MessageSettledInExistingMap: You have successfully settled in a new area.
LanguageData.MessageAmbushVictory: Victory! In {0} hours, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
LanguageData.MessageAutomaticallyReformedCaravan: Your colonists have reformed the caravan.
LanguageData.MessageRescueeJoined: Since you rescued HIM, {0} has joined your group!
LanguageData.MessageAttackedCaravanIsNowHostile: Because you attacked a caravan of {0}, this faction is now hostile to you.
LanguageData.MessageFactionPawnCrushed: {0} lost people to a roof collapse. Faction relation: {1}
LanguageData.MessageTransportersNotAdjacent: All pod launchers connected to the selected transport pods must be adjacent.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_Transpor: The loading process has been canceled because one of the transport pods has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadCanceled_FuelingP: The loading process has been canceled because one of the pod launchers has been destroyed.
LanguageData.MessageTransportersLoadingProcessStarted: Your colonists will now load the assigned items into the transport pods.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndLost: Your transport pods have arrived, but since there were no colonists inside, the contents are lost.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsArrivedAndAddedToCar: Your transport pods have arrived. The contents have been added to your caravan.
LanguageData.MessageFailedToLoadTransportersBecauseCo: The loading process has been canceled because one of the colonists has been lost.
LanguageData.MessageFinishedLoadingTransporters: Your colonists have finished loading the transport pods.
LanguageData.MessageTransportPodsDestinationIsTooFar: Each pod launcher would need at least {0}x chemfuel to send transport pods that far.
LanguageData.MessageCantAbandonLastColonist: You can't abandon the last colonist.
LanguageData.MessageCantEquipIncapableOfViolence: Cannot equip: {0} is incapable of violence.
LanguageData.MessageSlaughteringBondedAnimal: Because they are bonded, slaughtering {0} will make {1} unhappy.
LanguageData.MessageSelectOwnBaseToFormCaravan: To form a caravan, select your own colony or a site where you have people.
LanguageData.MessageScreenResTooSmallForUIScale: At this resolution and UI scale, the game interface would not fit on-screen. Please reduce UI scale or increase resolution.
LanguageData.MessageYouHaveToReformCaravanNow: You have to reform the caravan now. Everyone left behind will be abandoned.
LanguageData.MessageSelfTendUnsatisfied: To self-tend, {0} must also be assigned to Doctor work.
LanguageData.MessageCannotSelfTendEver: {0} is incapable of doing Doctor work, and so cannot ever self-tend.
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseUnreachable: It's not possible to reach this tile from the last waypoint.
LanguageData.MessageCantAddWaypointBecauseLimit: You can't add more than {0} waypoints.
LanguageData.MessageCantDoExecutionBecauseNoWardenCap: None of your wardens is capable of violence. The execution won't be performed.
LanguageData.MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoMoreEnemies: You have defeated all enemies. In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed.
LanguageData.MessageSiteCountdownBecauseNoEnemiesInit: In {0}, the caravan will automatically be reformed. You can reform the caravan now in the World screen.
